generated_text:
{
    "title": "Chicken Alfredo",
    "serving_size": 4,
    "ingredients": {
        "Pasta": "1 pound",
        "Chicken Breast": "2",
        "Butter": "1/2 cup",
        "Garlic": "4 cloves",
        "Heavy Cream": "2 cups",
        "Parmesan Cheese": "1 cup",
        "Salt": "to taste",
        "Pepper": "to taste"
    },
    "instructions": [
        "Cook pasta according to package instructions, drain and set aside.",
        "Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then cook in a skillet until no longer pink in the center, about 6-8 minutes per side.",
        "Remove chicken from skillet, let rest for a few minutes, then slice.",
        "In the same skillet, melt butter, add minced garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.",
        "Add heavy cream to the skillet, bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low.",
        "Add grated Parmesan cheese gradually, stirring constantly until the sauce is smooth and thickened.",
        "Season with salt and pepper to taste.",
        "Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce.",
        "Serve pasta topped with sliced chicken and extra Parmesan cheese if desired."
    ]
}
